title: Looking for more people to join my Ranked 5's team
body: Hello. I am a silver 2 player and I am looking for more people to join my ranked team so we can climb to gold before the season ends. I am a fairly hardcore player so I am on all the time and I am looking for likeminded people to join me. No ragers I'd like to get a positive team together. My name in game is Bradythegod and the team name is Prepare your butthole, join me if you are interested.

replies.body:
Heya,

Sounds cool.
My role from favorite to least : mid > support > top > jungle > adc

I'm a Gold player, maining mid lane.

Hit me up in game :)
I'm interested in your team, my name is SirJazza
